spec_data.Name: perl-Wx-Perl-ProcessStream
spec_data.Description:
This module provides the STDOUT, STDERR and exit codes of asynchronously
running processes via events. It may be used for long running or blocking
processes that provide periodic updates on state via STDOUT. Simple IPC is
possible via STDIN.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 06:29:15 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Access IO of external processes via events
